step_feedback.feedback: Good job stretching your arm overhead. Try to feel the resistance more actively.
Your elbow and wrist movements are a bit inconsistent. Focus on a strong fist and tightening your muscles as you inhale.
Continue to open your hand wide and relax your muscles as you exhale. Keep the fluid pumping visualization going.
Good effort on the repetitions. Ensure your hand is opening fully and your muscles are relaxed on the exhale.

exercise_summary: You're doing great with the overhead pumping! Remember to stretch your arm up, make a tight fist while breathing in, and then open your hand wide while breathing out. Keep visualizing the fluid moving.
